header.description: Ever find it boring and unsatisfying when you defeat the Ender Dragon and the egg is practically useless other than being a trophy and a decoration? Well now you don't have to worry, as this addon adds 8 new dragons into your game as a reward for defeating the Ender Dragon. Finally giving a reason to go to the end and put the egg in good use!
header.name: Dragon Mounts - Behavior Pack
